column1: Social and Display Insights Specialist II
column2: The  Social and Display Insights  Specialist will  handle  the  analy sis  and reporting mechanisms for the  distributed team for  the Biosciences Division . This person will be  developing data-derived insights and  recommendation s to optimize c onte nt  e ngagement , c hannel  c onversion , l ead  g eneration , and other important metrics . Additionally, this role  will  provide volume support and  quality checks of  d isplay  advertising  execution . The ideal candidate has experience in  working with large  data  sets  pulled from  Adobe Analytics or Google Analytics  and is able  building reports  a nd  visualizing metrics in  tools  such as PowerBI  and PowerPoint .  Recent  hands-on  experience in  S ocial  M edia  and Display  advertising is a requirement. This role will routinely perform data analysis , cleansing,  and visualization to  equip  the  channel managers with  the  actionable insights  needed to  meet our targets . If MS Excel  is your  tool of choice , you enjoy  being a data detective, describe yourself as  meticulous  and  analytical ,  and you get an adrenaline rush  from  finding new  ways to improve channel performance  and efficiency ,  then  this is an ideal position for you ! To be successful in this newly crafted position, you should be able working in a highly matrix environment in a global  organization and  be capable of concurrent  collaborati o n with  multiple channel  partners and managers within the global and team with various strengths . We are a diverse, innovative, knowledgeable, and dynamic team looking for the right teammate. Responsibilities:  Work with channel specialists to ensure quality control of Display campaign executions. Maintain current performance reporting practices while also working to improve those processes to provide growing levels of granularity and efficiency for the team and to our business partners.  Create a standardized reporting calendar and collaborate with Channel Managers on presenting impactful insights and analysis of performance health on a regular cadence through engaging data insights. Participate in scrum ceremonies and follow Agile methodology principles as part of an Agile Marketing team, demonstrating project management software. Stay up to date with the Digital Marketing industry trends to enhance long-term channel strategy. Leverage processes, lessons, standard methodologies, content calendars and documentation from the Global Programmatic Display Managers and Global Social Media Managers to build upon them. Be available during off-hours to participate in meetings with team members based in the US. Experience: 3-4 Yrs+ practical experience in B2B customer-centric digital marketing and/or eCommerce, ideal if also experienced in B2C. Robust experience with analytics tools (e.g. Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics) and data visualization tools (e.g. PowerBI or similar). Strong proficiency in Excel is required. Meaningful understanding and practical knowledge in paid media required, at minimum on native social platforms (eg. Meta, LinkedIn, Google Ads) and Display DSP or ad exchanges (e.g. Adobe Ad Cloud, Sizmek, The Trade Desk or DV360) Experience with project management tools (e.g. Workfront, Jira) preferred. Bachelor's Degree.  Experience running multiple strategic execution including ownership and oversight of large budgets of global campaigns. Knowledge, Skills, Abilities: Data-driven thinking with strong analytical skills paired with a good storytelling approach and the ability to analyze large data sets from multiple sources is desired.  Proficient at time management, interpersonal, planning and prioritization skills. Excellent teammate with a positive demeanor who is prepared to focus and chip in to achieve business units' objectives. Teamplayer with a positive perspective, one who is never satisfied with the bare minimum needed to accomplish business objectives.  Attention to detail. Experience in Agile methodology within a marketing organization is a plus.
column11: PowerBI, digital marketing, Google Analytics, data visualization, Adobe Ad Cloud, Sizmek, Jira, Adobe Analytics

column1: Finished Goods Planner (SCM) - Pharmaceutical Company (Hosur Road)
column2: Job Location: Bangalore (Hosur Road)                Designation: Finished Goods (FG) Planner                  Candidates from Pharma API companies highly preferred                  Job Summary:      The planner works within the planning horizon and in conjunction with CMO operations and DC2 production teams to produce and execute a production plan. The objective is to achieve the desired customer service levels, desired inventory coverage and to facilitate optimum inventory turnover/cycle time.       Job Responsibilities:          Prepare a 6-month rolling supply plan for all markets and finalized supply/production, plan will be uploaded in SAP.    The Planner is a primary point of contact for all supply related issues throughout the life cycle of products.    Create and issue stock transport orders (STOs) for finished goods will supply from DC2, if required based on business process    Monitor inventory levels for finish goods (example blocked, short dated etc.) and take appropriate actions as required with the objective of achieving inventory targets with sufficient expiry dating in order to meet customer service requirements, ensure timely disposal of rejected and expired products.    Maintain and update all applicable dates within SAP to provide current available to promise (ATP) dates, at the appropriate plant. As required, inform all applicable internal parties within organization when date changes impacts internal & external customer service.    Maintain open & continuous communication with CMO operation team, DC2 production, quality team, regulatory, R&D, procurement, project management for new product launch, warehouse, and logistics team to support all relevant activities for product supply. Provide priority recommendations to CMO & DC2 team and escalate to management as required.    Perform all work in accordance with all established regulatory, compliance and safety requirements of the organization.            Interested candidates kindly send your resume to   naveenkumar@bvrpc.com

column2: Description   : Our organization is looking for a Material Planner for its Plant at Manesar. The role of a Material Planner is to verify that production line delivery?aligns with?minimum stock targets?and logistics costs. Follow?supplier delivery performance?(supplier Misdeliveries Per Million) and the service of logistics partners and propose appropriate?improvement action plans. Liase with Freight Forwarders & CHA for smooth execution of import shipments. Direct?packaging management. Ensure that?logistics conventions?comply with purchasing objectives and support conditions set by suppliers for?procurement and packaging?and by logistics partners for transport and services. column2: Managing or completing supply planning based on a number of indicators (sales forecast, orders, production data).        Analyzing, controlling and reporting on relevant KPI, detecting plan deviations, and deriving recommendations.      Developing supplier forecasts and determine logistical processes with suppliers.      Analyzing order plans and critical timelines, and double-checking of available materials, parts or products in stock.      Executing load balancing calculations, and cooperating with other plants for respectively optimized plans.      Planning of monthly or weekly production program for the assigned plant(s).      Calculating and deploying short-term (day-to-day) production plans for assigned production resources.      A job at this level:      Plans the material, machine, and personnel or transportation and warehousing resources needed, for local plant or site operations.      Sets up comprehensive plans, related to production or transportation and delivery, in cooperation with local Operations or Logistics.      Initiate procurement orders, and release production or transportation orders according to the plans agreed.      Monitors efficiency of processes, and derive short-term measures when necessary.      Cooperates with Maintenance, Engineering or Production Management to identify deficiencies or improvement potential.

column2: POSITION: Senior Plannning Cordinator  LOCATION: Bangalore  ABOUT Company  The Company is a global manufacturer of interconnect components for numerous industries including Aerospace, Defense, Industrial, Medical, and Telecommunications. Its expertise in interconnect technologies and intimate market knowledge combined with our accessibility make them valued partners to leading brands across the globe. With expertise centers and manufacturing locations on 3 continents and 13 countries, it provides its customers product innovation, personalized support, and superior logistics.  Job Description  Job Title : Sr. Planning Coordinator  Department : SCM  Reports To : Supply Chain Manager  Education and / or Experience  Roles & & Responsibilities:  Responsible for order fulfillment.  Needs to ensure shipments against customer orders and distribution orders as per committed dates.  Ensure all materials are received on time in line with the KPI parameters to strike a balance between stock out and excess inventory and avert any line down situation.  Responsible to ensure maximum utilization of plant capacity by way of providing adequate work load of confirmed orders.  Responsible for inventory management.  Needs to effectively coordinate with other Radiall plants to ensure compliance to Radiall global practices.  Position Requirements :  Ability to act quickly on fluctuating demands  Strong interpersonal skills.  Ability to coordinate well with internal teams Key Competencies required:  Very good knowledge of all Planning and demand forecasting methods.  Very good knowledge of MRP,MPS and S&OP  Working Knowledge of manufacturing processes.  Should have worked on any ERP for atleast 2 years. Other Skills and Abilities :  MS Office and ability to use computer apps to complement the role.  Excellent communication skills  Ability to motivate team and lead by example Language Skills : Kannada, English essential  If interested please send your UPDATED Profile with below mentioned details.  Current CTC:  Expected CTC:  Notice Period:  Reason for Job Change:  With Regards,  Reshmi - HR Recruiter  Aarna HR Solutions  Mob No: : 9902579718

column2: The Assistant Purchase Manager is responsible for overseeing all raw material (RM), packing material (PM), inventory items, consumables and capital goods purchases for the organization. He will evaluate and recommend vendors and determine the most cost-effective inventory and reorder levels. He will negotiate price, delivery, and credit terms among the responsibilities.          Essential duties and responsibilities          Responsible for efficient purchasing of RM/PM, inventory supplies, and capital equipment. Receives purchase requisitions and verifies for accuracy and authorization(s). Periodically evaluates vendors/suppliers and advises Management when vendors are not meeting requirements. Evaluates and recommend new/substitute vendors, when necessary.      Prepares and issues purchase orders; determines and negotiates prices, delivery and credit terms; buys according to established company policies and procedures; maintains accurate purchasing records.      Responsible for evaluating, assessing and selecting vendors based on capabilities, performance and consistent quality. Maintains rapport and good working relationships with vendors; keeps accurate vendor records.      Evaluates inventory reorder levels and quantity price breaks to determine the most economical purchasing of inventory and supplies concerning the companys cost of capital. Prepares monthly reports and reviews forecast of purchasing commitments with Management.      Expedites purchase orders as necessary and ensures delivery of purchased items for uninterrupted manufacturing flow.      Performs other purchasing or inventory control duties as necessary or as requested.            Organizational relationships       Reports to the General Manager - Purchase. Coordinates activities with all departments, especially Manufacturing, Accounts Payable, and Warehouse. Works with Quality Control to ensure the quality of purchased materials.          Procedures       The Assistant Purchase Manager follows Companys procedures and policies. He also takes the responsibility of ownership of Purchase procedures and reviews the procedures on time to time basis to keep in tune with the market and technology.          Qualifications       A bachelors degree (majoring in Polymer or Chemistry) is required. A post-graduation in Material Management is preferred. Good communication skills and the ability to work well with people are essential. Good leadership skills are beneficial. He should be familiar with the SAP-based purchase cycle. Knowledge of Imports is essential and should be well conversant with Import procedures, CHA handling, LCs, forex expenses. A diploma or Certificate course in Export / Import is desirable.          Soft skill demands       The ability to communicate orally with vendors, management, and other co-workers, both individually and in front of a group is crucial. Regular use of the telephone and e-mail for communication is essential. Good command of English, Hindi and at least one regional language is essential.      The candidate should have high moral and ethical values while dealing with vendors and other authorities.      Sitting for extended periods is common. Hearing and vision within normal ranges is essential for normal conversations, and be prepared to make or inspect documents.      Good exposure for the use of common office applications such as computer terminals, laptops, SAP system, Vendor Relationship Management system calculator, copiers.          Work environment       The job is performed indoors in a traditional office setting. Activities include extended periods of sitting and extensive work at a computer. Hence knowledge of common Office applications such as Excel, Word, PowerPoint is necessary.          Experience       Should have at least 7 to10 years of purchase experience in the Chemical industry      or     Plastic or PVC industries are essential. Of which at least 1 to 2 years in handling team.
column11: Material management, Forex, Purchase, SAP, Chemical, Export import, Packaging, Inventory control, Manager Quality Control, Raw material
